category_system.description: Hindi profanity categorization system considering Hindu-Muslim cultural dynamics and modern Indian society
category_system.methodology: Based on sociolinguistic research across Hindi-speaking regions and contemporary usage analysis

family_insults.name: Family Honor Attacks
family_insults.description: Insults targeting family members, particularly mothers and sisters
family_insults.examples_note: Attacks on family honor, extremely severe in Indian cultural context

subcategories.honor_destruction: Direct attacks on family reputation and honor

family_insults.cultural_significance: Family honor is central to Indian society, making these most offensive
family_insults.social_consequences: Can lead to serious conflicts, violence, and social ostracism

sexual.name: Sexual Content
sexual.description: Sexually explicit language, anatomical references, and sexual behavior descriptions
sexual.examples_note: Highly taboo due to traditional Indian cultural values around sexual modesty
sexual.cultural_sensitivity: Extremely high due to traditional values around sexual purity
sexual.religious_implications: Conflicts with Hindu and Islamic teachings on sexual modesty

anatomical.name: Anatomical References
anatomical.description: References to body parts, particularly private areas and bodily functions
anatomical.examples_note: Body parts used inappropriately or crudely

subcategories.buttocks_anus: Rear end and anal references (गांडू, गांड)
subcategories.bodily_functions: References to elimination and sexual functions

anatomical.cultural_context: Indian culture emphasizes bodily modesty and cleanliness

derogatory.name: General Derogatory Terms
derogatory.description: Personal insults and character attacks without specific targeting
derogatory.examples_note: General insults attacking personality, character, or behavior

subcategories.worthlessness: Implying lack of value or purpose (नालायक)

animal_insults.name: Animal-Based Insults
animal_insults.description: Comparing people to animals, with cultural significance in Hindu context
animal_insults.examples_note: Animal comparisons with religious and cultural implications

subcategories.sacred_animal_insults: Inappropriate references to religiously significant animals

animal_insults.hindu_context: Some animals have religious significance in Hinduism
animal_insults.cultural_variations: Different animals have different cultural connotations

religious_blasphemy.name: Religious Profanity
religious_blasphemy.description: Language targeting religious beliefs, practices, or figures
religious_blasphemy.examples_note: Blasphemous or sacrilegious language across Hindu-Muslim contexts

subcategories.hindu_blasphemy: Inappropriate references to Hindu deities or practices

religious_blasphemy.interfaith_sensitivity: Must consider Hindu, Muslim, Sikh, and other religious sensitivities

caste_discrimination.name: Caste-Based Discrimination
caste_discrimination.description: Terms targeting caste identity and social hierarchy
caste_discrimination.examples_note: Discriminatory language based on traditional caste system

subcategories.lower_caste_slurs: Slurs against Dalits and other marginalized castes

caste_discrimination.legal_considerations: Caste discrimination is illegal in India

regional_ethnic.name: Regional and Ethnic Slurs
regional_ethnic.description: Discriminatory terms targeting regional, ethnic, or linguistic groups
regional_ethnic.examples_note: Discrimination based on regional origin or ethnicity

subcategories.north_south_divide: North Indian vs South Indian discrimination

gender_specific.name: Gender-Specific Insults
gender_specific.description: Insults specifically targeting gender identity or roles
gender_specific.examples_note: Gendered insults reflecting patriarchal social structures

subcategories.sexual_behavior_judgment: Judging sexual behavior based on gender

gender_specific.patriarchal_context: Reflects traditional patriarchal values in Indian society

lgbtq_discrimination.name: LGBTQ+ Discrimination
lgbtq_discrimination.description: Terms targeting sexual orientation or gender identity
lgbtq_discrimination.legal_context: India has decriminalized homosexuality, increasing sensitivity

mental_health.name: Mental Health Stigmatization
mental_health.description: Terms that stigmatize mental health conditions
mental_health.awareness_growing: Increasing awareness of mental health sensitivity

hinglish_modern.name: Modern Hinglish Profanity
hinglish_modern.description: Contemporary profanity mixing Hindi and English

subcategories.english_hindi_mixing: Code-switching between Hindi and English profanity
subcategories.bollywood_influence: Film industry influence on mixed language profanity

hinglish_modern.generational_factor: More common among younger, educated, urban populations

traditional_formal.name: Traditional Formal Insults
traditional_formal.description: Classical or formal Hindi insults with historical context
traditional_formal.examples_note: Traditional insults from classical Hindi literature and formal usage

subcategories.formal_disapproval: Formal ways of expressing strong disapproval

traditional_formal.educational_context: Sometimes acceptable in academic or literary contexts

1.description: हल्की गाली-गलौज जो अनौपचारिक माहौल में स्वीकार्य हो सकती है
1.description_en: Mild profanity that may be acceptable in informal settings
1.cultural_notes: May be used among friends but avoided in family and formal contexts

2.description: अशिष्ट भाषा जो अधिकांश सार्वजनिक स्थानों पर अनुचित है
2.description_en: Coarse language inappropriate in most public settings
2.cultural_notes: Causes offense in mixed company, avoided around elders and women

3.description: अत्यधिक आपत्तिजनक भाषा जो अधिकांश संदर्भों में अनुचित है
3.description_en: Highly offensive language inappropriate in most contexts
3.cultural_notes: Causes significant offense, limited to very informal male-only settings

4.description: अत्यंत आपत्तिजनक भाषा, सार्वजनिक चर्चा में वर्जित
4.description_en: Extremely offensive language, taboo in public discourse
4.cultural_notes: Taboo language that violates fundamental Indian cultural values

cultural_considerations.family_honor_centrality: Family honor (izzat) is central to Indian culture, making family insults most severe
cultural_considerations.religious_diversity: Must consider Hindu, Muslim, Sikh, Christian, and other religious sensitivities
cultural_considerations.caste_sensitivity: Caste-based discrimination is illegal and socially condemned
cultural_considerations.gender_dynamics: Traditional gender roles affect both usage and perception of profanity
cultural_considerations.regional_variations: Severity and usage vary significantly across different Hindi-speaking regions
cultural_considerations.generational_differences: Significant differences between traditional and modern attitudes
cultural_considerations.education_class: Educational level and socioeconomic class significantly affect language attitudes
cultural_considerations.urban_rural_divide: Urban areas more tolerant, rural areas more traditional
cultural_considerations.bollywood_influence: Film industry significantly influences popular language and attitudes
cultural_considerations.hinglish_evolution: Growing mixing of Hindi and English in urban contexts
